long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The goal of this extensions is to make UI (User-Interface) adjustments to the mobile version of the 9gag website. 

I hope to modify it in a way that will make it look less glitchy and hopefully more attractive to use.
